description:
Features

- Deckbuilding as you progress through the game
- Meditate and choose personality traits that alter your gameplay profoundly
- Explore a subconscious maze, full of cards and improvements that will help you defeat the monsters in your mind
- Light RPG mechanics that allow you to customize your character stats and skills
- Characters and places from your past that will tell facts and stories about mental health
- Deep gameplay mechanics that put focus on replayability and gameplay diversity
- Horrific monsters inspired by real-life phobias
name: Neurodeck
intro: Neurodeck is a psychological deckbuilding card game to challenge your fears. Build your deck and capacities by answering personality tests, visiting rooms or meditating.
